copy.creative.title: Hi, you've unlocked 15% off at Under Armour!
copy.creative.copy: Shop sneakers, apparel and accessories. Sign up & unlock your savings today!
copy.creative.termsAndConditions.message:
\*Offer is valid with a minimum of $100 order value in cart. Shop now and receive free shipping on all orders over $129 for purchases from the Australian website.
Minimum order amount must be met before shipping and handling charges or taxes are included. Under Armour reserves the right to cancel or modify this offer at any time. All orders are subject to Tests Terms and Conditions.
